data.message: When I click on your profile Eminem it goes to my brother Kevin Garramone page. Weird ! Anyway if you're interested in "abused ink" my family's got it to the Nth degree and talent. Love to hear from ya!

replies.message: A lot of people keep liking this comment let me know if it happens to anyone else. Eminem is not to be trusted lol The only reason he won't sign me is because im a better female version of him and he'd lose that rap battle. Poverty dude is like a walk in the park compared to my story and i was even recently homeless last year in Michigan and he's not lying it was freaking ghost town scary like their richest town makes bellport/Gordon heights ect.. look like the hamptons.
